column5: The first satellite, Sputnik 1, was launched.
The smallest satellite launch vehicle (L-4S; 9.4t weight, 1.4m diameter)
The first interplanetary launch by solid rocket (M-3SII)
Highest in history with altitude 865 km, also the fastest with speed 18k miles

column4: Manned foundations in space (STS-123, STS-124, STS-127)
column5: The world’s largest pressurized volume in space

column4:
Indigenous Tracking & Data Relay Satellite System 
First TDRS system to support manned missions

column5: Discovered water on the Moon before impact.
The first spacecraft to successfully demonstrate solar-sail technology in interplanetary space

column4: Lunar probe with extended deep space missions (asteroid mission to 4179 Toutatis).
column5: The first probe to reach Sun-Earth Lagrangian point from the lunar orbit and from there directly to an asteroid. Closest flyby of an asteroid at a distance of only 3.2 km.

column4: First lunar soft landing and lunar rover.
First successful Mars mission by an Asian country
column5: First Martian mission by an individual country to succeed on the first attempt

column4: Large solid boosters (LSBs) flown on an experimental flight give combined thrust of 5,150 kN

Suborbital flight was performed in 1972.
CZ-2A (LEO 2t) failed in 1974.
